item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Update Batch #112 Released:

1. You no longer can walk while stunned 2. Updated slayer skill/smithing skill guide it is now 100 % like the runescape one 3. Nosepeg now requires 60 slayer to wear 4. Added edible seaweed 5. Made all capes dyeable 6. Updated fight caves a lot 7. You can now attack random event npcs again 8. Freaky forester random event has been re enabled 9. When you enchant a dragonstone amulet you now will get an amulet of glory without charges 10. Fixed dragonstone amulet equipping in the wrong slot 11. Fixed green dragonhide prices 12. Fixed character login limit, minimum is 1, max is 12 13. Added yell timer for members 14. Fixed getting stuck at freaky forester random event 15. Fixed fires burning out so quickly 16. Made am i botting interface happen less often for rock crabs 17. Fixed burning pies saying you burnt salmon 18. Fixed no clipping with ladders 19. Fixed moving while opening doors that walk you through them 20. Fixed all tutorial island objects 21. Fixed chat spamming bug

If you would like to register you can register here!

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

mr extremez:

We have contacted out webhost, and hopefully it gets resolved soon. We will be downloading new themes soon, please suggest some themes that we should use though.

I’ll post them on the forums whenever I register, I have nothing else to do so I’ll be sure to check it out and what not.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Update Batch #111 Released:

1. Ned now sells rope 2. Added evil chicken forcechats 3. Evil chicken random + dark wizards now use magic instead of melee 4. Fixed knights health glitch at pest control 5. Fixed random fletching stop that would say you fletch a willow shortbow 6. Torchers now use magic at pest control 7. Defiler now use range at pest control 8. Attacking void monsters now give pc damage 9. Added splatter npcs to pest control 10. Fixed pest control npc emotes 11. Added splatter death effect 12. Pest control monsters no longer drop items 13. Added support for teleporting with all staffs 14. Fixed castle wars teleporting bug 15. Curry stew now heals the correct amount 16. Stew now heals the correct amount 17. Fixed all tzhaar npcs emotions 18. Added all tzhaar npcs spawns (Thanks eber for giving me the spawns) 19. Fixed tzhaar fight cave npcs dropping bones 20. Tzhaar npcs now have correct max hits 21. Tzhaar-mej now uses magic 22. Tzhaar-xil now has two forms range and melee 23. Fixed superheating runes bug

If you would like to register you can register here!

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Bumps

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Update batch #110 Released:

1. Gem stalls no longer give opals, red topaz, or jade 2. Halloween event has been disabled the total number of masks recieved and each color will be revealed soon 3. Added pyramid agility course to agility skill guide 4. Ground items now no matter what spawn on height level 0, if you login on a height above height level 0 they will appear on height 0 once you change regions or relog 5. Added chat filter you can toogle it on and off by typing ::filter 6. Fixed when you click on an object and you are following a player and then you click on the object you will no longer keep facing the player but you will face the object 7. Fixed when you click on an npc and you are following a player and then you click on the npc you will no longer keep facing the player but you will face the object 8. Added a walk through door method + fixed wizards tower doors 9. Rope now saves for kalphite lair on both rope spots 10. Shantay pass no longer requires pass on the way back 11. Fixed superheating without runes 12. Fixed diamond ring price 13. Home command now tells you exact time you need to tele home 14. Added sendhome command for mods 15. Superheat now gives correct magic exp 16. Ali's Discount wares now has correct items in it 17. Black robe no longer requires 10def/att to wear 18. Torn Robe now equips in correct slot 19. Fixed safespotting guards at varrock castle 20. Meat pizzas now only gives 1 slice of pizza back when eating it

If you would like to register you can register here!

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:172, topic:522072”]Well ya, but im reporting the problems so you can fix[/quote]Alright thanks then, instead of posting bugs on this main thread I would prefer you use the report a bug feature on our website though.

Update Batch #109 Released:

1. You can now make steel dart tips 2. Added quick use for staircases in the wizards tower 3. Fixed flour making not working 4. Fadli's bank at the duel arena now works 5. Added the halloween event server sided 6. Fixed fremennik robe weilding on your body weird 7. Lumbridge bank chest now requires 19 qp to use 8. Added Fadli's shop in the duel arena 9. You can no longer woodcut if you are in combat 10. Talk to with Fadli's gives the option to bank or open his shop 11. Bank chests at the duel arena have been fixed to position the right way 12. Noted red halloween masks now are tradeable/bankable/etc 13. Menaphite robes/tops now don't glitch when wearing and equip in the correct slot 14. Fixed villager robe apperance and it equips in the correct slot now 15. Fixed robe of elidinis apperance/slot it equips in and fixed black desert robe appearance/slot it equips in 16. Fixed gate by varrock dark wizards 17. Fixed prices for all stores at tzhaar city 18. Added correct amounts for all items in stores at tzhaar city 19. Fixed staircase in ardougne 20. Donnie now has dialogue in the Lumbridge general store 21. Added a lock picking system you now need to pick the locks of the 2 doors in east Ardougne

If you would like to register you can register here!

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Well ya, but im reporting the problems so you can fix

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:170, topic:522072”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=640580.msg4379878#msg4379878 date=1383168949]

Update batch # 108 Released:

1. Fixed all mining rocks in the wilderness 2. Making redberry pie now requires pastry dough instead of bread dough 3. When using a bucket of water on flour you will now have an option to make pastry dough or bread dough 4. The destroy option has been added to the portrait in the knights sword quest 5. Oysters now give items 6. Fixed some messed up gates in lumbridge 7. Making pastry dough or bread dough now will give 1 cooking exp (2.5 cooking exp because we are a 2.5x exp server) 8. Fixed not being able to attack vampyre in vampyre slayer 9. Modified the destroy item interface a little bit 10. Fixed auto retalitite it now saves on logout + sends correct messages when using it 11. Fixed npc experience bug 12. Fixed having to click objects twice if it had a second click object and you walked to it from a far distance 13. Fixed making mithril through rune dart tips 14. Fletching now stops if you drop an item while doing it 15. Halloween masks have been made tradeable/bankable/dropable/sellable/etc in preperation for the halloween event soon 16. Fixed climbing staircase from outside of draynor house 17. verified all object clicking server sided to stop cheat engines 18. Disabled a couple shops until their correct quest comes out (Namely the quartermaster) 19. All of the correct imp drops have been added 20. Fixed some npc drops that would disconnect you 21. You can now empty pots of flour to get an empty pot + you can empty bowls of water to get bowls

If you would like to register you can register here!

Flour Mill does not work at lummy, and I want to finish cooks assistant :[
[/quote]Fixing this now, sorry I was testing something.

Also this happen…

[/quote]I’m not sure, I’ve never seen it happen. But, if you do ever get stuck you can easily get unstuck by typing ::home

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Gigantic Remake of Runescape in 2006!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:163, topic:522072”][quote author=CoderOops link=topic=640580.msg4377841#msg4377841 date=1382587316]

Don’t we all!

Oh well, this server seems as if it’ll be around for awhile… I may start playing.

All links are dead.
[/quote]What are you talking about the website link is working fine.

Didnt work few hours earlier.

It’s still really slow to load the site.[/quote]We reported it to our webhost, we are getting it fixed asap.

Update Batch # 107 Released:

1. Fixed members not being able to yell/use lumby bank 2. Fixed dcing when attempting to chop jungle trees 3. Fixed edgville/heroes guild gates 4. You can now enter cut maghonany logs at the hardwood grove for 100 trading sticks 5. Fixed spam clicking monkey bars in the edgeville dungeon 6. The uncut onyx now costs 300k tokkul in its shop 7. Added redberry pie making 8. Added knights sword quest 9. Fixed all knights sword quest bugs I could find 10. Rfd chest/ape atoll teleport/champions guild now all require 19 qp to use 11. Added all npc spawns in the varrock castle + made all doors work 12. Added working opening/closing cupboard in falador castle and in morgans house in draynor 13. Fixed force bank glitch at hill giants entrance 14. Fixed the coal rock that was unminable in barbarian village 15. Added pie dish global drops in areas they belong 16. You cano now empty burnt pies to get your pie dish back 17. All shop owners will now walk around 18. Wydins store will temporarily sell 10 redberries until farming is fully added 19. Removed the 10 bananas from Wydins store he now sells 0 bananas and players can sell him bananas just like rs 20. Made all knights sword quest items untradeable/alchable/duelable/etc 21. Fixed quests not getting green in the quest tab after you beat them

If you would like to register you can register here!

Read full topic
